attributes.content: Tsk, tsk. The courtroom sure is lively today.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Today's trial will be open to the general public, and broadcasted live. Far too many people will be joining in on the fun.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Heh, this is the first time I've seen jurors representing so many different famiglie arrive in such an orderly fashion. This almost seems more like a press conference than a trial.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: After all, the man on trial today is none other than Leontuzzo Bellone.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia gave the order that 'the famiglie are not to interfere with the new city' but didn't elaborate on her plans beyond that. Everybody's scratching their heads.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Finally, the court representing Signora Sicilia's will is about to make its move, so of course it has everyone's undivided attention.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: But, the woman adjudicating the trial is that Judge Lavinia, and everybody knows she's tied up with the Bellones.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: There's no Bellones anymore, they're stricken from the books. What kind of connections could she have?
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: If you ask me, she's taking the initiative to convict Leontuzzo, exactly because she wants to show everybody she's done with the Bellones.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: And besides, Signora Sicilia's made it pretty clear what she's up to here. She's gonna make an example of him.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: She's playing her cards well.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Who knows.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Anyways, since Bernardo was the mastermind behind everything, his son's obviously involved. Today's trial should give us the closure we're looking for.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Look, the judge is here.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Order in the court.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Presumably, many of you are perplexed about today's hearing.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That is to be expected, because while you may know the man on trial today, you do not know the contents of the case.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I ask that you all remain patient.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I trust that nobody has forgotten that day, one week ago.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So much happened. Minister Rubio's broadcast, and the ensuing chaos that engulfed the city.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Many people died during that turmoil, and many others had their lives turned upside-down.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Fortunately, it was all eventually smoothed over.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Many people know now that Bernardo Bellone, the man who instigated this chaos, lost his life to it as well.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yet his objectives, as well as his motives, remain mysterious.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: During that incident, another man played an important role. He is none other than Bernardo Bellone's son, Leontuzzo Bellone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Bring him forward.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Order, order.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For some of you, this may be your first time seeing me. For others, you might've known me for a long time.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But first, allow me to introduce myself. I am Leontuzzo Bellone, and I am just an ordinary civilian now.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Ordinary civilian? Aren't you the heir to Famiglia Bellone?
attributes.name: Juror

attributes.content: I was. But now, I do not belong to any famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I know you all have many questions, and I will answer them one by one. First and foremost, however, I must explain what my father did, and how it came to this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: All of this most likely began with the death of Carracci, Ministero dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo, standing at the center of the courtroom under the watchful eyes of the entire crowd, shows no signs of nerves at all.
He methodically lays out the backdrop to this entire incident, starting from the assassination.
The other famiglie seem to have already received the news about the ownership of the new city.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I know. 'The famiglie are not to interfere with the new city.'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That she's willing to hold down the other famiglie is proof she wasn't lying when we talked.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But as far as I know, she neither said who would manage the new nomadic city, nor did she explain her rationale.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's how Grey Hall has always worked.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Signora Sicilia doesn't need to explain everything. Her orders are absolute.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, we need her explanation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Right now, everything about the new city is shrouded in uncertainty, and we owe the people an explanation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's right, which also brings us to our first dilemma.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Everything happened so suddenly. Am I supposed to get up on stage and announce to everyone, 'hey, we're going to build a city without famiglie?'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That would only scare everyone away.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If the only ones who end up there are you, me, Cellinia, and Rubio's followers, we've already failed at the very first step.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm guessing Signora Sicilia wants to see how we handle this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Looks like you have something in mind.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I want you to arrest me, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Come again?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: My father's actions, no matter his motivations and intentions, put us in this mess.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Someone must be held accountable, in the eyes of the people.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Besides, I'm doing the same thing, aren't I?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The assassination of Carracci, the alliance with the Saluzzos, the assassination of Donna Rossati, and finally, the separation of the secondary core area.
Though some of these events were not secret, when people learned that Bernardo was the driving force behind them, a commotion still broke out in the courtroom.
Leontuzzo lays out his father's plan as objectively as possible using the information he has.
Finally, after an hour-long exposition, the story comes to an end.
I know that many of you are here on behalf of various famiglie, and I assume you've all heard a number of rumors.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That one rumor is correct.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Everything was my father's doing, and the reason why he did it was––
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: 'For a Siracusa without famiglie.'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How is it possible that the don of a famiglia would want to tear down the entire system?
attributes.name: Confused Government Observer

attributes.content: Good question. Even I, his own son, was shocked when I found out.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This idea took root in my father's heart decades ago. And it only just now bore fruit.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo, drop the act already. Your father's dead, but you're still here. That's why you're trying to clear your name with all this nonsense.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: After all, we know exactly who the new city belongs to.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: I can handle accusations from some famiglie associates or soldiers, if that makes you happy.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If he was the mastermind behind all this, then why did he end up dead?
attributes.name: Skeptical Civilian

attributes.content: Il Signore dei Lupi.
Leontuzzo almost blurts the words, but finally suppresses them within his heart.
Because, everything about that existence is utterly absurd.
My father believed that if famiglie should not exist, then he should be eliminated too.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So, after setting everything in motion, he chose to commit suicide.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Pretty damned good joke there, kid!
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: You're telling me he was such a selfless saint? He really did all this for the common Siracusan?
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: The exact opposite, actually.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: My father was solipsistic, if anything. Everything he did was for the sake of the painting in his memory he called Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Which is why he failed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Alright... I get it now.
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Hah, no wonder. That's why Bernardo's dead, and you're still alive.
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: I dunno what kind of stunt you pulled, but you somehow stopped your papa, and then went to Signora Sicilia and took credit for it.
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: That's how you got yourself the right to manage the new city. And now, you're up here spinning a magical tale for us, trying to win some sympathy for yourself.
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Isn't that right, you patricide?
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Leontuzzo lets out a deep sigh, but in the end, looks away without refuting the accusation.
Deep down, he cannot deny it.
Look at that, see the guilt on his face!
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: I have a question.
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: Even if we did believe all that garbage, Your Honor, what does it have to do with the trial?
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: It's not like you want us passing judgment on a dead man and handing down a sentence for his crimes?
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: Because Leontuzzo is not here as a witness to tell you about his father or opine about his actions.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The case being heard today concerns the ownership of the new city.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leontuzzo arbitrarily determined what is to come in this new city, and in Siracusa as a whole.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leontuzzo, please explain to us why Signora Sicilia chose you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I was both my father's accomplice in everything that happened, as well as the one who stopped him.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I became the latter after I learned the truth.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I believe that my father was misguided, and that his actions would not bring a new era to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even if dragging all the famiglie into a war would somehow see them erase each other in the end, it does not necessarily mean that the people would choose a new way of life.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But beyond that, I saw a real opportunity in all this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So, at the end of everything, I went to Signora Sicilia and asked to borrow a city from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: 'A city without famiglie.'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Another joke? Why would Signora Sicilia ever agree to that?
attributes.name: Irascible Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Because it wasn't actually a request. It was a challenge to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In Signora Sicilia's eyes, my father's methods violated her order, and she couldn't tolerate that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But the method I chose... Though I don't want to put it this way, was something she found permissible. Otherwise, I wouldn't even be standing here speaking to all of you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo looks in a certain direction, to where a Sankta priest is standing.
The blindfolded priest does not seem to be paying attention to the ongoing trial.
Alright. If what you say is true, then Signora Sicilia's order does make more sense...
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Or I guess, this is the only explanation for why Signora Sicilia would've decided that.
attributes.name: Keen Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: If this really is true, Leontuzzo, then everything you're doing today is just for show.
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: Call this a trial? You might be standing here, this is all just announcing you as owner of the new city. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: No, this city does not belong to me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The new city will have everything you'd expect it to, with one exception—famiglie.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You really think you can keep them out?
attributes.name: Composed Famiglia Juror

attributes.content: What a stupid question. It's just as if I asked you, has the boundary between famiglie and ordinary civilians ever been respected?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Famiglie are only willing to abide by Signora Sicilia's rules because she's strong enough to dominate them.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And this gentleman's agreement among famiglie only exists because they don't have what it takes to wipe each other out.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Of course you'll come to the city. I know that, obviously.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But this time, you'll see what it is you've always underestimated.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Of course, I will welcome any famiglie looking to bring change as partners in the new city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't think there's any difference between 'a city without famiglie' and 'Siracusa without famiglie.' They're both crazy.
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: Do you say that because it's unrealistic, or because it's hard?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Because it's unrealistic, of course.
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: My father was definitely misguided, but I don't think either of these ideas are unrealistic.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're just too used to letting your eyes decide what is and is not realistic.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The famiglia are deeply ingrained into this land. You can't hope to uproot them. Nobody can.
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: But famiglie can be changed, and they can become more civilized.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even if they can't be wiped out, they should be changed into something else. And as long as that something else is what we want, then that's fine too.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And you really think you can make that work?
attributes.name: Calm Civilian Juror

attributes.content: I might fail, but don't you think it's worth a shot?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The only thing you've won for yourself is a handout from Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Serious Government Observer

attributes.content: The famiglia system still exists. Though it may appear shaky right now, it is by no means so easy to topple.
attributes.name: Serious Government Observer

attributes.content: No matter if this business today is serious or just for show, it's only possible because you have Signora Sicilia's permission.
attributes.name: Serious Government Observer

attributes.content: Is there actually any point to all of this?
attributes.name: Serious Government Observer

attributes.content: Unfortunately, if things don't pan out the way I want them to, then I'm afraid we'll simply be replaced like a tablecloth.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Plus, I've never considered my success inevitable. That day, I was honestly ready to die.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But that doesn't mean I won't take an opportunity that presents itself, handout or not.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Maybe in some other place, given the same set of circumstances, someone in my position could've been a better person and turned down the handout.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But in Siracusa, at this very moment, if this is the only way to move things forward, then that is the pill I will swallow.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Would Ministro Rubio have done what he did, if there was another option?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Are you aware of the consequences?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What we're doing is unprecedented. How am I supposed to guess what the consequences will be?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, this is what I believe.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Lavinia, I owe an answer not only to all of Volsinii, but to you and everyone around you. Right?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: After that day, we didn't get a chance to talk things through, and only had a vague idea of what the other was thinking.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Are we really walking down the same path?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is the new city that I want the same as the one you want?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We don't really know how the other thinks, do we?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: ...I trust you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you trust me, that's all the more reason to pass judgment on me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Not just for your sake, but for all the officials who've rallied around you because of Rubio.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Otherwise, what reason would they have to trust me, a man who was mafia royalty?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This isn't a burden you have to carry alone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I ought to shoulder the responsibility with you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No... I've finally come to understand the words you said to me, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Our world views are fundamentally different.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As the former heir to a famiglia, there's no way I can empathize with your perspectives and experiences.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What I have to suffer now... is just dealing with whatever's left over after unloading that identity.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Also, from a utilitarian perspective, the people trust you, and this is a real chance for you to lock in that image.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If you put it like that, I'm afraid a lot of people will see this trial as nothing more than a show.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Let them think that then. It doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Even if they do think it's a show, sometimes, the willingness to put on a show is already a gesture in its own right. Don't you think?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Anyway, Lavinia, that's what I think.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We haven't accomplished anything big just yet.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: One day, we'll end up mistrusting each other.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: One day, when we come to our senses, we might realize that we've been misguided all along.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo Bellone, what is it that makes you stand here so resolutely?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You were born into a famiglia, yet now, you've become the famiglie's worst enemy. Why?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why, huh... I ask myself the same question a lot.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is it my idea of chasing efficiency?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Was I raised on ideals of justice?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is it because of the actions of an admirable government official?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is it a conclusion from a minor observation of changes in the famiglie?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Maybe all of the above.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If we put all these reasons together, we might be able to come up with an answer––
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The time has come.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Maybe Carracci avoided assassination and became a successful Ministero dei Lavori Pubblici, working hard towards a similar goal.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Maybe Ministro Rubio chose to show restraint and continued to occupy his position, secretly winning people over with his lofty ideals and striving to bring change to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This wasn't some elaborate plan I've been hatching my whole life. It suddenly dawned on me at some point, and I only made it this far on luck.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If I die, there'll be someone who comes after me, and another man after that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And none of this is a testament to how hard I work or how unique I am. It just means that––
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The time has come for Siracusa to change.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: One question after another is thrown at Leontuzzo, the entire court filled with voices interrogative and vitriolic.
He stands in the center of the courtroom, earnestly and tirelessly answering every question he deems worthwhile.
Slowly but surely, more and more people begin to think that this young man is actually quite thoughtful, and that––
He's serious.
In the end, the courtroom's entire atmosphere seems to cower before him.
All the jurors present, all the civilians watching, and all the people tuning in through various media.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Until now, my heart has been filled with uneasiness.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I borrowed this city from Signora Sicilia, but never saw it as something that belonged to me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I borrowed this city from Signora Sicilia so we could work together to build something completely new, for all of you to work towards a Siracusa free from the famiglie.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Because I made that decision on everyone's behalf, I must also face everyone's judgment.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But, if you'll let me make a single grand statement–
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: At this moment, Siracusa doesn't have the right to judge me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And so, I can only be judged... by all of you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You will receive this right, just as if you had won the power to build an entirely new city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Maybe one day, at one point in the future, the power to determine Siracusa's future will also lie in your hands.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This new city welcomes all of those dissatisfied living under the yoke of the famiglie and those who have their doubts, including doubts about me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's all I wanted to say.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.text: The trial, believed to be Leontuzzo's first public speech as Nuovo Volsinii's mayoral candidate, sparked widespread discussion as well as heated resistance from some famiglie.
But without a doubt, this one-man show of a trial at long last laid the foundations for Nuovo Volsinii to truly come into fruition.
It is but a new beginning.
